name: orchardist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who owns or runs an orchard (= an area of land where fruit trees are grown): After his retirement, he began a new career as an orchardist, raising apples and pears on a farm in the West Country. The guests were each given a cup of apple juice before the orchardist took them on a tour of the farm.
More examplesFewer examplesOrchardists in Vermont begin pruning their trees in early February and will continue until they start blooming in April. A prolonged drought has forced the orchardists in the area to cut their growing season short.
